Name: Paranautical Activity: Deluxe Atonement Edition
About the game: Paranautical Activity combines the classic FPS action of games like Doom and Quake, with the randomness and difficulty of modern roguelikes like Binding of Isaac and Spelunky. -Unique FPS/Roguelike combination -Procedurally generated levels -Impossibly fast gameplay -Hidden levels -Over 100 items -40+ enemies -Ridiculous bosses‚Äè -Kick ass Dubstep soundtrack The Deluxe Atonement Edition includes the following -Developer footage & commentary, from prototype to pre alpha to full release! -The Seafarers Guide; A pro guide with a nautical twist. Consult the pro guide to become the leanest, baddest, mostest bestest Paranautical Activity player you can be. -1 new level type, 1 new weapon and 1 new item. -Wallpapers baby!
